Class UserDao

java.lang.Object
wgu.softwaretwo.samircokic.DAO.UserDao
public abstract class UserDao extends Object

This class is the blueprint for the User class object and it handles its sql queries.

    • user

      public static wgu.softwaretwo.samircokic.model.User user(String name, String pass) throws SQLException

      This method queries the database table users and returns the user object

      Parameters:
      name - username
      pass - password
      Returns:
      if the username and a password matches the database records it returns the user object associated with a query.
      Throws:
      SQLException - provides information on database access errors.

    • usernameAndPasswordCheck

      public static int usernameAndPasswordCheck(String name, String pass) throws SQLException

      This method queris the users table and retrieves the user id if it matches the arguments, else it returns 0.

      Parameters:
      name - username
      pass - password
      Returns:
      the user id
      Throws:
      SQLException - provides information on database access errors.

    • usernameCheck

      public static int usernameCheck(String name) throws SQLException

      this method checks if the username exist in the database, if it exist then it returns its associated id if not then it returns 0.

      Parameters:
      name - username
      Returns:
      user id
      Throws:
      SQLException - provides information on database access errors.
